summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center; authorizing concession lease agreements with Mrs. Dorothy L. Ashley d/b/a Jones Fantastic Museum, the C.L.E. Co., Inc., d/b/a Seattle Center "Sky Ride", and a license agreement with the Mac Amusement Company and Mackey and Aubin Concession Company (Fun Forest) for the use and occupancy of certain premises in the Seattle Center and authorizing amendment of such agreements.
